page.title: 05SHOPS IN LANGPORT
page.content: Most of the shops in Langport are in the main street but 11 are in the adjacent car park. The position is important for trade as the street is narrow and used by heavy traffic. The range of shops has improved recently although there is some doubt among locals as to the need for services such as travel and estate agents. Customers tend to use the shops in Langport if they only need a few items.For weekly or monthly shopping trips many people go to the larger towns and make it a family outing. The majority of shops are open from 9-5.30 (except newsagents, who work longer hours) although some close early on Wednesdays and Saturdays.Only one or two are open on Sundays. Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays are the busiest days for the traders.
